DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate efficacy drug-eluting balloon angioplasty follow nitinol stent implantation versus nitinol stent implantation superficial femoral artery popliteal artery stenosis .

DOC.criteria: age > 18 year intermittent claudication ( Fontane III IV ) angiographic stenosis > 50 % occlusion superficial femoralpopliteal artery > 40mm least one belowknee vessel ankle allergy Paclitaxel contraindication combine antiplatelet treatment life expectancy < 1 year hypersensitivity contraindication one study drug lack consent
